alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:54PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THOMAS AND NORTHEASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM MDT/430 PM CDT/... At 254 PM MDT/354 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Brewster to 7 miles south of Levant. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Levant around 400 PM CDT. Colby around 410 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 30 and 59. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
